structured_data.overall: The survey focused on anime preferences rather than employee satisfaction or workplace factors. Employee provided minimal responses, showing limited engagement.

mental_health.comment: No indicators to assess mental health

structured_data.summary: Brief survey about anime viewing habits. Employee watches anime daily and prefers action genre.
structured_data.next_steps: Follow up with a more job-focused survey as this one was about anime preferences. Consider using more engaging questions to elicit detailed responses.
structured_data.raw_transcript: AI: Hey. How are you? I want to take some some of time for short survey. User: But AI: Before we get started, could you please provide your employee ID? User: 9 9 4. AI: Thank you for providing your employee ID 994. Is that correct? User: Yeah. AI: Great. Let's dive into the survey. This survey is about understanding your anime viewing habits and preferences. Your input will help us better understand the anime community and might even influence future anime productions. Please feel free to share your thoughts honestly. To start off, I'm curious about how often anime fits into your routine. Is it something you enjoy daily or perhaps it's more of a weekly treat for you? User: Daily. AI: That's awesome. Watching anime daily must mean it's a big part of your routine. It's great to have something you enjoy so much. Out of curiosity, when it comes to anime, is there a particular genre that really grabs your attention? Maybe something you always find yourself coming back to. User: Action. AI: Action. Got it.

feedback: Survey appears to be about anime rather than work-related topics
